doc:
Wilson Cruz https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wilson_Cruz 0 Wilson Cruz (born Wilson Echevarría; December 27, 1973) is an American actor known for playing Rickie Vasquez on My So-Called Life, Angel in the Broadway tour production of Rent and the recurring characters Junito on Noah's Arc and Dr. Hugh Culber on Star Trek: Discovery. As an openly gay man of Puerto Rican ancestry, he has served as an advocate for gay youth, especially gay youth of color. Wilson_Cruz ( born Wilson_Echevarría ; December_27_,_1973 ) is an_American_actor known for playing Rickie_Vasquez on My_So-Called_Life , Angel in the_Broadway_tour_production of Rent and the_recurring_characters_Junito on Noah 's_Arc_and_Dr._Hugh_Culber on Star_Trek : Discovery . As an_openly_gay_man of Puerto_Rican_ancestry , he has_served as an_advocate for gay_youth , especially_gay_youth of color .
